mapper.sql: LOG_TRANS_ID AS logTransId , TRANS_CONFIG_ID AS transConfigId , CHANNEL_ID AS channelId , TRANSNAME AS transname , STATUS AS status , LINES_READ AS linesRead , LINES_WRITTEN AS linesWritten , LINES_UPDATED AS linesUpdated , LINES_INPUT AS linesInput , LINES_OUTPUT AS linesOutput , LINES_REJECTED AS linesRejected , ERRORS AS errors , STARTDATE AS startdate , ENDDATE AS enddate , LOGDATE AS logdate , DEPDATE AS depdate , REPLAYDATE AS replaydate , LOG_FIELD AS logField , EXECUTING_SERVER AS executingServer , EXECUTING_USER AS executingUser , EXCUTOR_TYPE AS excutorType , LOGINFO AS loginfo , TRANS_CN_NAME AS transCnName
